TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataControlFieldTypeEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides an editing user interface (UI) for a data control field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This editor is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls.
